content.rendered:
Directed by Mark Mylod

Written by Seth Reiss. Will Tracy

Star Anya Taylor-Joy(Margot). Ralph Fiennes(Chef Slowik). Nicholas Hoult(Tyler). John Leguizamo(Movie Star). Aimee Carrero(Felicity). Janet McTeer(Lillian). Judith Light(Anne). Hong Chau(Elsa). Paul Adelstein(Ted). Rob Yang(Bryce). Arturo Castro(Soren). Christina Brucato(Katherine). Reed Birney(Richard). Mel Fair(Boatman). Michael A. Dean(Chef). Mark St. Cyr(Dave). Adam Aalderks(Jeremy). Peter Grosz(Sommelier). John Wilkins III(Server 2). Rebecca Koon(Linda). Matthew Cornwell(Coast Guard Officer Dale). Rachel Trautmann(Chef). Cristian Gonzalez(Server #1 (Niels)). Victor Zheng(Chef). A. Jae Michele(Chef). John Cola(Chef). Jay Shadix(Front of House / Elsa’s Staff #3). Jon Paul Allyn(Boat Waiter). Kionna Townes(Chef). Grant Henley(Chef). Brandon Herron(Front of House). Alexander Goldstein(Chef). Marcus Aveons Duncan(Chef). Thomas Goh(Waiter). Elbert Kim(Police Officer (uncredited)). Melisa Lopez(Police Officer (uncredited))

Language English

Producers Will Ferrell. Jenna Go. Katie Goodson. Betsy Koch. Adam McKay. DanTram Nguyen. Zahra Phillips. Seth Reiss. Michael Sledd. Will Tracy

Production Alienworx Productions. Alienworx Productions. Hyperobject Industries
